no-device-selected: No device was selected. Please make sure your device is plugged in.
cant-claim: Unable to claim interface. Please make sure that your device is not being used by another application
browser-not-supported: Browser does not support WebUSB. Please try Chrome.
generic-error: Something went wrong, please disconnect device and try again!
another-wallet-trying-to-connect-with-ke: Another wallet is trying to connect with your KeepKey.
user-cancelled-request-device-bluetooth: User cancelled bluetooth connection.  Please try reconnecting.
operation-that-changes-interface-state-i: An operation that changes interface state is in progress.  Please wait.
connection-not-open-on-send: There is an issue with the web socket connection.  Please try again.
